question: What is the fiqhi definition of "musical instrument".
answer:
QUESTION

What is the fiqhi definition of "musical instrument".

ANSWER


Share:

Generally, musical instruments are referred to as ‘Ma’azif’ in the classical books of Hadith. Mullah Ali Qari, author of Mirqaatul Mafaatih, has explained the term to include all instruments of ‘lawh’ (time wasting). (Mirqaat vol.10 pg.172; Imdaadiyah)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
